thread.title_full: Clean Republic Hill Topper Electric Bike Kit reviewed by Donald

author: Donald
title: Donald
text: As advertised and all I could do here is repeat what other excellent reviews have said. Good service and nice follow up by Company to be sure all is okay. I am inept at mechanics, however, no problem installing the system. At 82 (and 1/2), while in good shape I sometimes have hesitated going an extra mile or two or venturing off into an unknown area, but, know, if I tire, all I have to do is push a button.. Had ridden a fair distance a week ago and wanted to explore another area, but, a long high bridge was a barrier for my tired legs. No problem. Pushed a button and voila the barrier was conquered and my ride was extended. I do not hesitate to recommend this product.
